DOC.detailed_description: A randomized , double-blind , placebo-controlled clinical trial 18 men age 30 50 year obesity ( BMI 30-39.9 ) accord OMS criterion without treatment . They assign randomly two group 9 patient , receive 5 mg tadalafil placebo every day night 28 day . There evaluated Insulin secretion , first phase insulin secretion Stumvoll Inex well Total Insulin Secretion Area Under Curve glucose insulin Insulinogenic Index , Insulin sensitivity Matsuda index . Waist circumference , glucose insulin level , lipid profile , creatinine acid uric level blood pressure go load evaluate intervention group . Statistical analysis present measure central tendency dispersion , average deviation standard quantitative variable ; frequency percentages variable qualitative . Qualitative variable analyze X2 , use difference inter-group Mann-Whitney U Test Wilcoxon Test within-groups difference . Will consider statistical significance p ≤0.05 . This protocol approve local Ethics Committee write informed consent obtain volunteer .
